title: Water once a week
description: Always check your plants before watering, the topsoil should be dry to touch. For succulents allow the potting mix to dry completely before watering again.

title: Needs bright indirect sunlight
description: Place your plants on window sills where it can get the brightest possible indirect light. Bright indirect light is when the plant is within a couple of feet of a natural source of light.

title: Toxic to pets
description: The plant can cause anything from irritation to fatal damage to your pets on contact or ingestion. Prolonged exposure can result in long term side effects and death.

title: Needs Gardening experience
description: The plant needs a knowing eye of a gardener to understand what it needs. Fairly easy to grow if you take care of their set of requirements.
